医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心首次实施 ALS 靶向基因治疗俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心是全国第一家对特定形式的肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者进行靶向基因治疗的中心之一，ALS 是一种影响大脑和脊柱细胞的神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ohio-State-University-Wexner-Medical-Center-administers-first-targeted-gene-therapy-for-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ohio-State-University-Wexner-Medical-Center-administers-first-targeted-gene-therapy-for-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3d20e25-3615-42e5-8a13-95078d5b52ad Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:02:38 -0400 Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center administers first targeted gene therapy for ALS
生酮饮食有望解决与多囊卵巢综合症相关的荷尔蒙失衡问题研究人员对生酮饮食对多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）的影响进行了荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-addressing-hormonal-imbalance- Associated-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-addressing-hormonal-imbalance- Associated-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfe314fd-9c21-44b1-bee8-17cf25e8f9dd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:54:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet shows promise in addressing hormonal imbalance associated with PCOS
眼球追踪技术可以帮助改善痴呆症老年人的生活质量评估居住在住宅老年护理机构中的澳大利亚人中有超过 50% 被诊断出患有痴呆症，世界各地的老年护理服务机构都在为未来 30 年 65 岁及以上的老年人数量增加一倍做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Eye-tracking-technology-can-help-improve-quality-of-life-assessment-for-older-people-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Eye-tracking-technology-can-help-improve-quality-of-life-assessment-for-older-people-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=230b83dc-b0d9-4a2e-ac8c-66b62e625fd6 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:52:31 -0400 Eye-tracking technology can help improve quality of life assessment for older people with dementia
年度 NHS 儿童流感疫苗接种计划正在进行中针对 2 至 3 岁儿童、学龄儿童和 6 个月以上患有某些健康问题的儿童的年度 NHS 流感疫苗接种计划正在进行中。家长将从下周开始收到邀请。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Annual-NHS-flu-vaccination-program-for-children-is-getting-underway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Annual-NHS-flu-vaccination-program-for-children-is-getting-underway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6489918-78ba-4562-a835-58cb636fce74 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:37:52 -0400 Annual NHS flu vaccination program for children is getting underway
突破性的全基因组研究发现了影响载脂蛋白 E 水平和阿尔茨海默病风险的新位点影响血浆载脂蛋白 E 水平的新遗传因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Breakthrough-genome-wide-study-uncovers-new-loci-impacting-apolipo Protein-E-levels-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Breakthrough-genome-wide-study-uncovers-new-loci-impacting-apolipo Protein-E-levels-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=118abf79-710b-445a-b32c-44b78739c332 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:35:00 -0400 Breakthrough genome-wide study uncovers new loci impacting apolipoprotein E levels and Alzheimer's risk
使用非甾体抗炎药与育龄女性血栓风险较高有关，与使用高风险激素避孕药的女性的关联性更强《BMJ》上发表的一篇新论文探讨了这些药物同时使用对静脉血栓栓塞 (VTE) 风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NSAID-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-blood-clots-in-women-of-reproductive-age-association-stronger-in-女性高危激素避孕.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NSAID-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-blood-clots-in-women-of-reproductive-age-association-stronger-in-女性高风险激素避孕.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c4acb05-436a-4478-b88d-e5801819be6f Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:25:00 -0400 NSAID use linked to higher risk of blood clots in women of reproductive age, association stronger in women on high-risk hormonal contraception
生殖因素和子宫内膜癌风险相关吗？女性特定生殖因素与子宫内膜癌风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Are-reproductive-factors-and-endometrial-cancer-risk-linked.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Are-reproductive-factors-and-endometrial-cancer-risk-linked.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ff4c511-95d5-4231-88d7-665f1f330ccc Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:05:00 -0400 Are reproductive factors and endometrial cancer risk associated?
青少年饮酒与急性伤害的风险较高相关饮酒与因饮酒而去医院的风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Adolescent-drinking-is-linked-with-a-higher-risk-of-acute-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Adolescent-drinking-is-linked-with-a-higher-risk-of-acute-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b5a10d2-d339-4e6b-82f7-f67d3cd7f9db Fri, 08 Sep 2023 08:36:00 -0400 Adolescent drinking is associated with a higher risk of acute harm

医科达与国际原子能机构 (IAEA) 合作，改善服务欠缺国家获得癌症护理的机会医科达创始人兼董事会主席 Laurent Leksell 博士与 IAEA 总干事 Rafael Mariano Grossi 博士在斯德哥尔摩会面，讨论减轻全球癌症负担https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Elekta-and-the-International-Atomic-Energy-Agency-(IAEA)-partner-to-improve-access-to-cancer-care-in-服务不足的国家.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Elekta-and-the-International-Atomic-Energy-Agency-(IAEA)-partner-to-improve-access-to-cancer-care-in-服务不足的国家.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c99d98e-e356-464b-9914-91f93a7818db Fri, 08 Sep 2023 07:23:00 -0400 Elekta and the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) partner to improve access to cancer care in underserved countries
